#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    long int n;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin >> n;
        if(n==0)
        {
            cout << 0<< "\n";
        }
        else if(0<n && n<=6)
        {
            cout << 2 << "\n";
        }
        else if(6<n && n<=75)
        {
            cout << 3 << "\n";
        }
        else if(75<n && n<=180)
        {
            cout << 4 << "\n";
        }
        else if(180<n && n<=2205)
        {
            cout << 5 << "\n";
        }
        else if(2205<n && n<=8232)
        {
            cout << 6 << "\n";
        }
        else if(8232<n && n<=26544)
        {
            cout << 7 << "\n";
        }
        else if(26544<n && n<=76560)
        {
            cout << 8 << "\n";
        }
    }
}
